Name: Strong Guy
Description: According to his own admission, Guido was a nerdy-looking kid in his early life, bullied by other children, but after he discovered his mutant ability at a young age, when he was struck by a school bus, no one bullied him again.
FirstComicDescription: X-Factor goes federal! After the team is sponsored as a government agency, Polaris, Multiple Man, and Guido take some time to bond. Quicksilver discovers that his super-speed is accelerating his aging. And X-Factor sponsor Val Cooper recruits two new members!
